mapper.select: SELECT toi.id, toi.office_name, toi.office_address, toi.legal_person_name, toi.legal_person_mobile, toi.ticket_office_license, toi.legal_person_card_up, toi.legal_person_card_down, toi.create_time, toa.ticket_office_account_name, toa.`status` FROM ticket_office_infermation toi INNER JOIN ticket_office_account toa ON toi.id = toa.id WHERE toi.id = #{id}
